channel.title: Checking length of uid?
channel.description:
how would i make it check the length of the uid?
this is wat i tryed, didn't work... (thats why im asking for help) [code] if(UID.length() >= 15){ disconnected = true;} [/code] errors [code]client.java:12595: int cannot be dereferenced if(UID.length() >= 15){ ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Note: server.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
help fast gotta go sleep soon

item.title: Checking length of uid?
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

how would i make it check the length of the uid?

this is wat i tryed, didn’t work… (thats why im asking for help)

if(UID.length() >= 15){
disconnected = true;}

errors

client.java:12595: int cannot be dereferenced if(UID.length() >= 15){ ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Note: server.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .
